Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to eligibility for paratransit services
Summary: Opens eligibility of paratransit services to individuals with disabilities or health conditions who are able to utilize the public buses and railroad operated by the authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง1299-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to eligibility for paratransit services
